channel.title: develops video technology on Logotyp.us
channel.description: Recent content in develops video technology on Logotyp.us

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
Polycom Logo Polycom, Inc., now a part of Plantronics, Inc., was an American multinational corporation that develops video, voice and content collaboration and communication technology. Polycom was co-founded in 1990 by Brian L Hinman and Jeffrey Rodman. In 2018 Polycom was acquired by Plantronics and in 2019 the name of the combined entity was changed to Poly. Source
You can download thePolycomlogo on full-version of the page. ]] >
item.title: Polycom
item.description: Polycom, Inc., now a part of Plantronics, Inc., was an American multinational corporation that develops video, voice and content collaboration and communication technology. Polycom was co-founded in 1990 by Brian L Hinman and Jeffrey Rodman. In 2018 Polycom was acquired by Plantronics and in 2019 the name of the combined entity was changed to Poly. Source
